message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.  Given that, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This offer reflects the true value of the product.  What do you say?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I still feel that $10,000 is a reasonable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000.
